channel.title: Docker on Anand vyas
channel.description: Recent content in Docker on Anand vyas

item.title: Docker Intro
item.description: Docker is a container management service. Which basic means upload/install required things in one container and ship to any where. Docker announced in March 2013 and since then it has become a major tool in development world. Docker Release Docker EE (Enterprise Edition) [Paid] Docker CE (Community Edition) [Free] Docker for Cloud Docker Stable and Edge version Edge (Beta) released monthly, Stable quarterly Stable version rolls in three months of Edge features Docker Architecture Docker uses a client-server architecture.

item.title: Install Docker on Ubuntu 16.04
item.description: There are two ways to install Docker CE (Community Edition) are, Install from repository Install from latest edge release Install from repository # Update the package index sudo apt-get update # Allow apt to use a repository over HTTPS sudo apt-get install apt-transport-https ca-certificates curl software-properties-common # Add Dockerâ€™s official GPG key curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg | sudo apt-key add - # Add the Docker repository to APT sources sudo add-apt-repository "deb [arch=amd64] https://download.
